title: Guide: How to be TOXIC/TROLL/AFK and get away with it!
body:
Just troll, feed, rage, blame everyone, afk etc

Get suspended or banned? 

No problem! 

Just create another 20 accounts and keep doing the same :)

Until Riot actually cares and IP bans people or 1 real name per account you can get away with anything and everything!

GG riot!

replies.body:
Riot does care, and that's why they don't IP ban. 

+ More often than not they end up banning whole internet cafes and campus networks, which hurts lots of good players. It doesn't even stop a good troll either, he can just use a dynamic IP.

+ I'm not sure what you meant by _"1 real name per account"_?
 Riot doesn't have access to citizen data bases anyway, so this isn't possible. The only place where they have something similar to this is in **KR**, but only because it's required under law.
Coool thank for the guide time to get me revenge People watch out for my smurf on the rift
You sure have a lot of time to level up those accounts. If thats how you enjoy the game go ahead and get yourself banned.
Spoken like a self destructive child.
